cmCourseInfo.description: Discussion of topics of current interest in planetary science with emphasis on papers published in scientific journals. This course is intended for students in the final year of the Planetary Science specialist program. Students must enrol with the course coordinator.
cmCourseInfo.title: Interdisciplinary Seminar in Planetary Science

breadthTypes.description: BR=5 The Physical and Mathematical Universes

notes.name: Course Note
notes.content:
Timetable Instructions
To enrol in this course, please contact Lillian Lanca at lanca@astro.utoronto.ca.

cmCourseInfo.description: Research report by student in consultation with individual staff member in Astronomy, Chemistry, Geology or Physics. This course is intended for students in the final year of the Planetary Science specialist program. Students must enrol with the course coordinator. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
cmCourseInfo.title: Research in Planetary Science

breadthTypes.description: BR=5 The Physical and Mathematical Universes
